title: Dan Patrick – Hour 3 – Former NBA veteran Cuttino Mobley
itunes:title: Dan Patrick – Hour 3 – Former NBA veteran Cuttino Mobley
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan Patrick, and the guys debate which Western Conference team has been the most impressive so far: the Golden State Warriors or the Memphis Grizzlies, and tell us if can expect Miguel Cabrera to get his 3000th hit this weekend. Plus, former NBA veteran and FOX Sport Radio NBA analyst Cuttino Mobley swings by to discuss what’s caused the rash of injuries to hit NBA superstars during these playoffs, why we should pump the brakes on crowning the Warriors too early, why he still isn’t ready to count out Kyrie Irving and the Brooklyn Nets despite being down 0-2 to the Boston Celtics, and much more!

#JSS

#OddCouple

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
